item.title: Build a custom Website for Only $10.88 a Year: Free Static Site Hosting with Custom Domain (2026 Guide)
item.description: Learn how to build a professional website for just $10.88/year using free static site hosting (Netlify, GitHub Pages, Cloudflare), Hugo SSG, and cheap domain registration. Complete tutorial with monetization options for blogs and portfolios.
